name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lumine’s Melody: Genshin Impact Violin Serenade Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lumine’s Melody: Genshin Impact Violin Serenade live wallpaper with a clock and Google search bar for a musical new tab experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features
Live Wallpaper: Features Lumine’s serene violin performance from Genshin Impact.
Built-in Clock: Easy-to-read time display.
Google Search Bar: Convenient access to search directly from your tab.
Optimized Performance: Smooth and lightweight design for seamless browsing.
Perfect for Fans: A beautiful tribute to Genshin Impact and Lumine.
